stripped_text: When you rez Lily Lockwell, draw 3 cards. click, remove 1 tag: Search R&D for an operation, reveal it, and shuffle the rest of R&D. Add the operation to the top of R&D.
text: When you rez Lily Lockwell, draw 3 cards. [click], remove 1 tag: Search R&D for an operation, reveal it, and shuffle the rest of R&D. Add the operation to the top of R&D.
title: Lily Lockwell
